name: Five Nights at Candias +PLUS+
description:

what can i say about this game, it's a FNaF joke fangame, but LOOK AT THAT MECHANICS, AT THAT GRAPHICS, AT THAT     D  I  F  F  I  C  U  L  T  Y

a game for eating all your spaghetti in 30 seconds.

Dedicated to Matías Candia, the best youtuber (LMAO)
